name: LEGENDS of SPORTS
description:
A unique application for the Apple TV users to watch the documentary films on the lives of the Sports Legends of multiple sports.
* App contains a lot of films on those super stars in different sports who produced historical momonts for their countries and clubs over the last hundred years.
* Top eight Sports included and each Sports contains a lot Films on the stars
* Lives
* Childhood
* Inspirations
* Struggles
* Passion
* Goal
* Success
* Acheivements
and much more.
App contains stories on lives of like MUHAMMAD ALI, MICHEAL JORDON, MICHEAL PHILIPS, PELE, MARADONA etc.
Download the app and enjoy.
